name: CHHapticEventParameter
desc: A static parameter value that represents a single property of the haptic pattern.

items.name: init(parameterID: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID, value: Float)
items.desc: Creates a haptic event parameter from its ID and value.

items.name: struct CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
items.desc: An identifier for an event parameter.

items.name: var parameterID: CHHapticEvent.ParameterID
items.desc: The haptic parameter ID indicating what type of parameter the current event represents.
